generic.flightNumberFormat error: Please choose a valid flight number. Examples of valid flight numbers: VC1, VC4320, VC1000, VC9999, V11, 1234
generic.validTo error: Please choose a date later than "Valid from"
generic.firstDay error: Please choose a date that is at least 1 hour in the future
generic.lastDay error: Please choose a date later than "First day"
generic.duplicate flightNumber error: Please choose another flight number for this day

delete-modal.heading: Delete {entityName}
delete-modal.body: Do you really want to delete this {entityName}?
delete-modal.body-with-id: Do you really want to delete the {entityName} {entityId}?

errorMessages.Only PlanItems from unreleased Plans can: Only plan items from unreleased plans can be deleted
errorMessages.Only unreleased plans can be deleted: Only unreleased plans can be deleted
errorMessages.Something went wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later
errorMessages.The start time of the plan period must b: The start time of the plan period must be at least one hour in the future
errorMessages.Plan can not be released due to invalid: Plan can not be released due to invalid connection(s)
errorMessages.unspecifiedVertiportRegion: Connection ({connection}) has unspecified region for the vertiport ({vertiport}), please check
errorMessages.inconsistentDepArrValidFrom: Connection ({connection}) starting date is not consistent with vertiport ({vertiport})
errorMessages.inconsistentDepArrValidTo: Connection ({connection}) end date is not consistent with vertiport ({vertiport})
errorMessages.departureVertiportNoPassengerService: Vertiport ({id}) has an empty 'services' field, please check
errorMessages.arrivalVertiportNoPassengerService: Vertiport ({id}) has an empty 'services' field, please check
errorMessages.connectionUniqueName: Name field should be unique, try other name
errorMessages.noServiceDepArv: Services field of the associated vertiport ({name}) is missing, please check
errorMessages.genericMessage: Please Check the error(s) displayed for respective field(s)
errorMessages.uniqueConnectionValidFromTo: An existing connection for same route over this time period already exists, please check
